mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Berthault, Pierre Gabriel, 1737-1831
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Camp de Jalès
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Prise du camp de Jalès par les patriotes
Taking the Jalès camp by the patriots
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Soldiers on foot and on horseback charge up a hill to defeat a group of men with a cross, flag, and swords. Fighting also takes place across the plain in the background. Two castles and small towns surround the plain
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Broadus Bailey French Revolution Print Collection
